contents.zh-CHS: 有关每种消息类型的确切格式，请参见以下部分。

contents.text: 6.2 Interswitch BPDU Message
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2 交换机间BPDU报文

contents.text: The Interswitch BPDU message consists of a variable number of octets, as shown below:
contents.zh-CHS: 交换机间BPDU消息由可变数量的八位字节组成，如下所示：

contents.text: Frame header/ISMP packet header
contents.zh-CHS: 帧报头/ISMP数据包报头

contents.text: This 20-octet field contains the frame header and the ISMP packet header.
contents.zh-CHS: 此20个八位字节字段包含帧头和ISMP数据包头。

contents.text: Version
contents.zh-CHS: 版本

contents.text: This 2-octet field contains the version number of the message type. This document describes ISMP message type 4, version 1.
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段包含消息类型的版本号。本文档介绍ISMP消息类型4，版本1。

contents.text: Opcode
contents.zh-CHS: 操作码

contents.text: This 2-octet field contains the operation type of the message. For an Interswitch BPDU message, the value should be 1.
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段包含消息的操作类型。对于交换机间BPDU消息，该值应为1。

contents.text: Message flags
contents.zh-CHS: 消息标志

contents.text: This 2-octet field is currently unused. It is reserved for future use.
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段当前未使用。这是留作将来使用的。

contents.text: BPDU packet
contents.zh-CHS: BPDU包

contents.text: This variable-length field contains an IEEE-compliant 802.2 Bridge Protocol Data Unit. See [IEEE] for a detailed description of the contents of this field.
contents.zh-CHS: 此可变长度字段包含符合IEEE标准的802.2网桥协议数据单元。有关此字段内容的详细说明，请参见[IEEE]。

contents.text: 6.3 Interswitch Remote Blocking Message
contents.zh-CHS: 6.3 交换机间远程阻塞消息

contents.text: The Interswitch Remote Blocking message consists of 30 octets, as shown below:
contents.zh-CHS: 交换机间远程阻塞消息由30个八位字节组成，如下所示：

contents.text: Frame header/ISMP packet header
contents.zh-CHS: 帧报头/ISMP数据包报头

contents.text: This 20-octet field contains the frame header and the ISMP packet header.
contents.zh-CHS: 此20个八位字节字段包含帧头和ISMP数据包头。

contents.text: Version
contents.zh-CHS: 版本

contents.text: This 2-octet field contains the version number of the message type. This document describes ISMP message type 4, version 1.
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段包含消息类型的版本号。本文档介绍ISMP消息类型4，版本1。

contents.text: Opcode
contents.zh-CHS: 操作码

contents.text: This 2-octet field contains the operation type of the message. Valid values are as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段包含消息的操作类型。有效值如下所示：

contents.text: 2 Enable/disable remote blocking 3 Acknowledge previously received Remote Blocking message
contents.zh-CHS: 2启用/禁用远程阻止3确认以前收到的远程阻止消息

contents.text: Message flags
contents.zh-CHS: 消息标志

contents.text: This 2-octet field is currently unused. It is reserved for future use.
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段当前未使用。这是留作将来使用的。

contents.text: Blocking flag
contents.zh-CHS: 阻挡旗

contents.text: This 4-octet field contains a flag indicating the state of remote blocking on the link over which the message was received. A value of 1 indicates remote blocking is on and no undirected ISMP messages should be sent over the link. A value of 0 indicates remote blocking is off. This flag is irrelevant if the operation type (Opcode) of the message has a value of 3.
contents.zh-CHS: 此4-octet字段包含一个标志，指示接收消息的链路上的远程阻塞状态。值1表示远程阻塞已打开，不应通过链路发送无向ISMP消息。值为0表示远程阻止已关闭。如果消息的操作类型（操作码）的值为3，则此标志不相关。

contents.text: 6.4 Interswitch Resolve Message
contents.zh-CHS: 6.4 交换机间解析消息

contents.text: There are two versions of the Interswitch Resolve message used by the SecureFast VLAN product.
contents.zh-CHS: SecureFast VLAN产品使用两种版本的交换机间解析消息。

contents.text: 6.4.1 Prior to Version 1.8
contents.zh-CHS: 6.4.1 1.8版之前的版本

contents.text: The Interswitch Resolve message used by SFVLAN prior to version 1.8 consists of a variable number of octets, as shown below:
contents.zh-CHS: 版本1.8之前的SFVLAN使用的交换机间解析消息由可变数量的八位字节组成，如下所示：

contents.text: n = 46 + length of known address TLV
contents.zh-CHS: n=46+已知地址TLV的长度

contents.text: In the following description of the message fields, the term "originating" switch refers to the switch that issued the original Interswitch Resolve request. The term "owner" switch refers to that switch to which the destination endstation is attached. And the term "responding" switch refers to either the "owner" switch or to a switch at the end of the switch flood path that does not own the endstation but issues an Interswitch Resolve response because it has no downstream neighbors.
contents.zh-CHS: 在以下消息字段的描述中，术语“始发”交换机指发出原始交换机间解析请求的交换机。术语“所有者”交换机是指目标端站所连接的交换机。术语“响应”交换机指的是“所有者”交换机或交换机泛洪路径末端的交换机，该交换机不拥有终端站，但发出交换机间解析响应，因为它没有下游邻居。

contents.text: With the exception of the resolve list (which has a different size and format in a Resolve response message), all fields of an Interswitch Resolve message are allocated by the originating switch, and unless otherwise noted below, are written by the originating switch.
contents.zh-CHS: 除解析列表（在解析响应消息中具有不同的大小和格式）外，交换机间解析消息的所有字段均由发起交换机分配，除非下文另有说明，否则由发起交换机写入。

contents.text: Frame header/ISMP packet header
contents.zh-CHS: 帧报头/ISMP数据包报头

contents.text: This 20-octet field contains the frame header and the ISMP packet header.
contents.zh-CHS: 此20个八位字节字段包含帧头和ISMP数据包头。

contents.text: Version
contents.zh-CHS: 版本

contents.text: This 2-octet field contains the version number of the message type. This document describes ISMP message type 5, version 1.
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段包含消息类型的版本号。本文档介绍ISMP消息类型5，版本1。

contents.text: Opcode
contents.zh-CHS: 操作码

contents.text: This 2-octet field contains the operation code of the message. Valid values are as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段包含消息的操作代码。有效值如下所示：

contents.text: 1 The message is a Resolve request. 2 The message is a Resolve response. 3 (unused in Resolve messages) 4 (unused in Resolve messages)
contents.zh-CHS: 1该消息是一个解决请求。2该消息是一个解析响应。3（在解析消息中未使用）4（在解析消息中未使用）

contents.text: The originating switch writes a value of 1 to this field, while the responding switch writes a value of 2.
contents.zh-CHS: 发起开关将值1写入此字段，而响应开关将值2写入。

contents.text: Status
contents.zh-CHS: 地位

contents.text: This 2-octet field contains the status of a Resolve response message. Valid values are as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段包含解析响应消息的状态。有效值如下所示：

contents.text: 0 The Resolve request succeeded (ResolveAck). 1 (unused) 2 The Resolve request failed (Unknown).
contents.zh-CHS: 0解析请求成功（ResolveAck）。1（未使用）2解析请求失败（未知）。

contents.text: This field is written by the responding switch.
contents.zh-CHS: 此字段由响应开关写入。

contents.text: Call tag
contents.zh-CHS: 呼叫标签

contents.text: This 2-octet field contains the call tag of the endstation packet for which this Resolve request is issued. The call tag is a 16- bit value (generated by the originating switch) that uniquely identifies the packet.
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段包含发出此解析请求的端站数据包的调用标记。呼叫标签是一个16位的值（由发起交换机生成），它唯一地标识数据包。

contents.text: Source MAC of packet
contents.zh-CHS: 包的源MAC

contents.text: This 6-octet field contains the physical (MAC) address of the endstation that originated the packet identified by the call tag.
contents.zh-CHS: 此6位字节字段包含发起由呼叫标签标识的数据包的终端站的物理（MAC）地址。

contents.text: Originating switch MAC
contents.zh-CHS: 始发交换机MAC

contents.text: This 6-octet field contains the physical (MAC) address of the switch that issued the original Resolve request.
contents.zh-CHS: 此6位字节字段包含发出原始解析请求的交换机的物理（MAC）地址。

contents.text: Owner switch MAC
contents.zh-CHS: 所有者交换MAC

contents.text: This 6-octet field contains the physical (MAC) address of the switch to which the destination endstation is attached -- that is, the switch that was able to resolve the requested addressing information. This field is written by the owner switch.
contents.zh-CHS: 此6位字节字段包含目标端站连接到的交换机的物理（MAC）地址，即能够解析请求的寻址信息的交换机。此字段由所有者开关写入。

contents.text: If the status of the response is Unknown, this field is irrelevant.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果响应的状态未知，则此字段不相关。

contents.text: Known destination address
contents.zh-CHS: 已知目的地址

contents.text: This variable-length field contains the known attribute of the destination endstation address. This address is stored in Tag/Length/Value format. (See Section 2.3.)
contents.zh-CHS: 此可变长度字段包含目标端站地址的已知属性。此地址以标记/长度/值格式存储。（见第2.3节。）

contents.text: Count
contents.zh-CHS: 计数

contents.text: This 1-octet field contains the number of address attributes requested or returned. This is the number of items in the resolve list.
contents.zh-CHS: 此1-octet字段包含请求或返回的地址属性数。这是“解决”列表中的项数。

contents.text: Resolve list
contents.zh-CHS: 解析列表

contents.text: This variable-length field contains a list of the address attributes either requested by the originating switch or returned by the owner switch. Note that in a Resolve request message, this list contains only the tags of the requested address attributes (see Section 2.3). On the other hand, a Resolve response message with a status of ResolveAck contains the full TLV of each resolved address attribute. The number of entries in the list is specified in the count field.
contents.zh-CHS: 此可变长度字段包含由原始交换机请求或由所有者交换机返回的地址属性列表。请注意，在解析请求消息中，此列表仅包含请求地址属性的标记（请参阅第2.3节）。另一方面，状态为ResolveAck的Resolve响应消息包含每个已解析地址属性的完整TLV。列表中的条目数在“计数”字段中指定。

contents.text: In an Interswitch Resolve response message, this field is irrelevant if the status of the response is Unknown.
contents.zh-CHS: 在交换机间解析响应消息中，如果响应状态未知，则此字段不相关。

contents.text: 6.4.2 Version 1.8
The Interswitch Resolve message used by SFVLAN version 1.8 consists of a variable number of octets, as shown below:
contents.zh-CHS: SFVLAN版本1.8使用的交换机间解析消息由可变数量的八位字节组成，如下所示：

contents.text: In the following description of the message fields, the term "originating" switch refers to the switch that issued the original Interswitch Resolve request. The term "owner" switch refers to that switch to which the destination endstation is attached. And the term "responding" switch refers to either the "owner" switch or to a switch at the end of the switch flood path that does not own the endstation but issues an Interswitch Resolve response because it has no downstream neighbors.
contents.zh-CHS: 在以下消息字段的描述中，术语“始发”交换机指发出原始交换机间解析请求的交换机。术语“所有者”交换机是指目标端站所连接的交换机。术语“响应”交换机指的是“所有者”交换机或交换机泛洪路径末端的交换机，该交换机不拥有终端站，但发出交换机间解析响应，因为它没有下游邻居。

contents.text: With the exception of the resolve list (which has a different size and format in a Resolve response message) and the four fields following the resolve list, all fields of an Interswitch Resolve message are allocated by the originating switch, and unless otherwise noted below, are written by the originating switch.
contents.zh-CHS: 除解析列表（在解析响应消息中具有不同的大小和格式）和解析列表后面的四个字段外，交换机间解析消息的所有字段均由发起交换机分配，除非下文另有说明，否则由发起交换机写入。

contents.text: Frame header/ISMP packet header
contents.zh-CHS: 帧报头/ISMP数据包报头

contents.text: This 20-octet field contains the frame header and the ISMP packet header.
contents.zh-CHS: 此20个八位字节字段包含帧头和ISMP数据包头。

contents.text: Version
contents.zh-CHS: 版本

contents.text: This 2-octet field contains the version number of the message type. This section describes version 3 of the Interswitch Resolve message.
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段包含消息类型的版本号。本节介绍交换机间解析消息的版本3。

contents.text: Opcode
contents.zh-CHS: 操作码

contents.text: This 2-octet field contains the operation code of the message. Valid values are as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段包含消息的操作代码。有效值如下所示：

contents.text: 1 The message is a Resolve request. 2 The message is a Resolve response. 3 (unused in Resolve messages) 4 (unused in Resolve messages)
contents.zh-CHS: 1该消息是一个解决请求。2该消息是一个解析响应。3（在解析消息中未使用）4（在解析消息中未使用）

contents.text: The originating switch writes a value of 1 to this field, while the responding switch writes a value of 2.
contents.zh-CHS: 发起开关将值1写入此字段，而响应开关将值2写入。

contents.text: Status
contents.zh-CHS: 地位

contents.text: This 2-octet field contains the status of a Resolve response message. Valid values are as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段包含解析响应消息的状态。有效值如下所示：

contents.text: 0 The Resolve request succeeded (ResolveAck). 1 (unused) 2 The Resolve request failed (Unknown).
contents.zh-CHS: 0解析请求成功（ResolveAck）。1（未使用）2解析请求失败（未知）。

contents.text: This field is written by the responding switch.
contents.zh-CHS: 此字段由响应开关写入。

contents.text: Call tag
contents.zh-CHS: 呼叫标签

contents.text: This 2-octet field contains the call tag of the endstation packet for which this Resolve request is issued. The call tag is a 16- bit value (generated by the originating switch) that uniquely identifies the packet.
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段包含发出此解析请求的端站数据包的调用标记。呼叫标签是一个16位的值（由发起交换机生成），它唯一地标识数据包。

contents.text: Source MAC of packet
contents.zh-CHS: 包的源MAC

contents.text: This 6-octet field contains the physical (MAC) address of the endstation that originated the packet identified by the call tag.
contents.zh-CHS: 此6位字节字段包含发起由呼叫标签标识的数据包的终端站的物理（MAC）地址。

contents.text: Originating switch MAC
contents.zh-CHS: 始发交换机MAC

contents.text: This 6-octet field contains the physical (MAC) address of the switch that issued the original Resolve request.
contents.zh-CHS: 此6位字节字段包含发出原始解析请求的交换机的物理（MAC）地址。

contents.text: Owner switch MAC
contents.zh-CHS: 所有者交换MAC

contents.text: This 6-octet field contains the physical (MAC) address of the switch to which the destination endstation is attached -- that is, the switch that was able to resolve the requested addressing information. This field is written by the owner switch.
contents.zh-CHS: 此6位字节字段包含目标端站连接到的交换机的物理（MAC）地址，即能够解析请求的寻址信息的交换机。此字段由所有者开关写入。

contents.text: If the status of the response is Unknown, this field is irrelevant.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果响应的状态未知，则此字段不相关。

contents.text: Known destination address
contents.zh-CHS: 已知目的地址

contents.text: This variable-length field contains the known attribute of the destination endstation address. This address is stored in Tag/Length/Value format.
contents.zh-CHS: 此可变长度字段包含目标端站地址的已知属性。此地址以标记/长度/值格式存储。

contents.text: Count
contents.zh-CHS: 计数

contents.text: This 1-octet field contains the number of address attributes requested or returned. This is the number of items in the resolve list.
contents.zh-CHS: 此1-octet字段包含请求或返回的地址属性数。这是“解决”列表中的项数。

contents.text: Resolve list
contents.zh-CHS: 解析列表

contents.text: This variable-length field contains a list of the address attributes either requested by the originating switch or returned by the owner switch. Note that in a Resolve request message, this list contains only the tags of the requested address attributes. On the other hand, a Resolve response message with a status of ResolveAck contains the full TLV of each resolved address attribute. The number of entries in the list is specified in the count field.
contents.zh-CHS: 此可变长度字段包含由原始交换机请求或由所有者交换机返回的地址属性列表。请注意，在解析请求消息中，此列表仅包含请求的地址属性的标记。另一方面，状态为ResolveAck的Resolve响应消息包含每个已解析地址属性的完整TLV。列表中的条目数在“计数”字段中指定。

contents.text: In an Interswitch Resolve response message, this field is irrelevant if the status of the response is Unknown.
contents.zh-CHS: 在交换机间解析响应消息中，如果响应状态未知，则此字段不相关。

contents.text: Actual destination switch MAC
contents.zh-CHS: 实际目的地交换机MAC

contents.text: This 6-octet field contains the physical (MAC) address of the actual switch within the chassis to which the endstation is attached. If the status of the response is Unknown, this field is irrelevant.
contents.zh-CHS: 此6-octet字段包含终端站所连接机箱内实际交换机的物理（MAC）地址。如果响应的状态未知，则此字段不相关。

contents.text: Downlink chassis MAC
contents.zh-CHS: 下行机箱MAC

contents.text: This 6-octet field contains the physical (MAC) address of the downlink chassis. If the status of the response is Unknown, this field is irrelevant.
contents.zh-CHS: 此6位字节字段包含下行链路机箱的物理（MAC）地址。如果响应的状态未知，则此字段不相关。

contents.text: Actual chassis MAC
contents.zh-CHS: 实际机箱MAC

contents.text: This 6-octet field contains the physical (MAC) address of the uplink chassis. If the status of the response is Unknown, this field is irrelevant.
contents.zh-CHS: 此6位字节字段包含上行链路机箱的物理（MAC）地址。如果响应的状态未知，则此字段不相关。

contents.text: Domain name
contents.zh-CHS: 域名

contents.text: This 16-octet field contains the ASCII name of the domain. If the status of the response is Unknown, this field is irrelevant.
contents.zh-CHS: 此16个八位字节字段包含域的ASCII名称。如果响应的状态未知，则此字段不相关。

contents.text: 6.5 Interswitch New User Message
contents.zh-CHS: 6.5 Interswitch新用户消息

contents.text: The Interswitch New User message consists of a variable number of octets, as shown below:
contents.zh-CHS: Interswitch新用户消息由可变数量的八位字节组成，如下所示：

contents.text: In the following description of the message fields, the term "originating" switch refers to the switch that issued the original Interswitch New User request. The term "previous owner" switch refers to that switch to which the endstation was previously attached. And the term "responding" switch refers to either the "previous owner" switch or to a switch at the end of the switch flood path that did not own the endstation but issues an Interswitch New User response because it has no downstream neighbors.
contents.zh-CHS: 在以下消息字段的描述中，术语“始发”交换机指发出原始交换机间新用户请求的交换机。术语“先前所有者”开关指终端站先前连接的开关。术语“响应”交换机指的是“以前的所有者”交换机或交换机泛洪路径末端的交换机，该交换机不拥有终端站，但发出交换机间新用户响应，因为它没有下游邻居。

contents.text: With the exception of the resolve list, all fields of an Interswitch New User message are allocated by the originating switch, and unless otherwise noted below, are written by the originating switch.
contents.zh-CHS: 除解析列表外，交换机间新用户消息的所有字段均由发起交换机分配，除非下文另有说明，否则由发起交换机写入。

contents.text: Frame header/ISMP packet header
contents.zh-CHS: 帧报头/ISMP数据包报头

contents.text: This 20-octet field contains the frame header and the ISMP packet header.
contents.zh-CHS: 此20个八位字节字段包含帧头和ISMP数据包头。

contents.text: Version
contents.zh-CHS: 版本

contents.text: This 2-octet field contains the version number of the message type. This document describes ISMP message type 5, version 1.
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段包含消息类型的版本号。本文档介绍ISMP消息类型5，版本1。

contents.text: Opcode
contents.zh-CHS: 操作码

contents.text: This 2-octet field contains the operation code of the message. Valid values are as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段包含消息的操作代码。有效值如下所示：

contents.text: 1 (unused in a New User message) 2 (unused in a New User message) 3 The message is a New User request. 4 The message is a New User response.
contents.zh-CHS: 1（在新用户消息中未使用）2（在新用户消息中未使用）3该消息是新用户请求。4该消息是一个新的用户响应。

contents.text: The originating switch writes a value of 3 to this field, while the responding switch writes a value of 4.
contents.zh-CHS: 发起开关将值3写入此字段，而响应开关将值4写入。

contents.text: Status
contents.zh-CHS: 地位

contents.text: This 2-octet field contains the status of a New User response message. Valid values are as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段包含新用户响应消息的状态。有效值如下所示：

contents.text: 0 VLAN resolution successful (NewUserAck) 1 (unused) 2 VLAN resolution unsuccessful (NewUserUnknown)
contents.zh-CHS: 0 VLAN解析成功（NewUserAck）1（未使用）2 VLAN解析失败（NewUserUnknown）

contents.text: This field is written by the responding switch.
contents.zh-CHS: 此字段由响应开关写入。

contents.text: Call tag
contents.zh-CHS: 呼叫标签

contents.text: This 2-octet field contains the call tag of the endstation packet for which this New User request is issued. The call tag is a 16- bit value (generated by the originating switch) that uniquely identifies the packet that caused the switch to identify the endstation as a new user.
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段包含发出此新用户请求的终端站数据包的呼叫标签。呼叫标签是一个16位的值（由发起交换机生成），它唯一地标识导致交换机将终端站标识为新用户的数据包。

contents.text: Source MAC of packet
contents.zh-CHS: 包的源MAC

contents.text: This 6-octet field contains the physical (MAC) address of the endstation that originated the packet identified by the call tag.
contents.zh-CHS: 此6位字节字段包含发起由呼叫标签标识的数据包的终端站的物理（MAC）地址。

contents.text: Originating switch MAC
contents.zh-CHS: 始发交换机MAC

contents.text: This 6-octet field contains the physical (MAC) address of the switch that issued the original New User request.
contents.zh-CHS: 此6位字节字段包含发出原始新用户请求的交换机的物理（MAC）地址。

contents.text: Previous owner switch MAC
contents.zh-CHS: 前所有者交换机MAC

contents.text: This 6-octet field contains the physical (MAC) address of the switch to which the endstation was previously attached -- that is, the switch that was able to resolve the VLAN information. This field is written by the previous owner switch.
contents.zh-CHS: 此6-octet字段包含终端站先前连接到的交换机的物理（MAC）地址，即能够解析VLAN信息的交换机。此字段由上一个所有者开关写入。

contents.text: If the status of the response is Unknown, this field is irrelevant.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果响应的状态未知，则此字段不相关。

contents.text: MAC address of new user
contents.zh-CHS: 新用户的MAC地址

contents.text: This 24-octet field contains the physical (MAC) address of the new user endstation, stored in Tag/Length/Value format.
contents.zh-CHS: 此24个八位字节字段包含新用户端站的物理（MAC）地址，以Tag/Length/Value格式存储。

contents.text: Count
contents.zh-CHS: 计数

contents.text: This 1-octet field contains the number of VLAN identifiers returned. This is the number of items in the resolve list. This field is written by the previous owner switch.
contents.zh-CHS: 此1-octet字段包含返回的VLAN标识符的数量。这是“解决”列表中的项数。此字段由上一个所有者开关写入。

contents.text: If the status of the response is Unknown, this field and the resolve list are irrelevant.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果响应的状态未知，则此字段和解决列表无关。

contents.text: Resolve list
contents.zh-CHS: 解析列表

contents.text: This variable-length field contains a list of the VLAN identifiers of all static VLANs to which the endstation belongs, stored in Tag/Length/Value format (see Section 2.3). The number of entries in the list is specified in the count field. This list is written by the previous owner switch.
contents.zh-CHS: 此可变长度字段包含终端站所属的所有静态VLAN的VLAN标识符列表，以标记/长度/值格式存储（见第2.3节）。列表中的条目数在“计数”字段中指定。此列表由上一个所有者开关写入。

contents.text: If the status of the response is Unknown, this field is irrelevant.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果响应的状态未知，则此字段不相关。

contents.text: 6.6 Interswitch Tag-Based Flood Message
contents.zh-CHS: 6.6 基于交换机间标签的泛洪消息

contents.text: There are two versions of the Interswitch Tag-Based Flood message used by the SecureFast VLAN product.
contents.zh-CHS: SecureFast VLAN产品使用两种版本的基于交换机间标签的泛洪消息。

contents.text: 6.6.1 Prior to Version 1.8
contents.zh-CHS: 6.6.1 1.8版之前的版本

contents.text: The Interswitch Tag-Based Flood message used by SFVLAN prior to version 1.8 consists of a variable number of octets, as shown below:
contents.zh-CHS: SFVLAN在版本1.8之前使用的基于交换机间标签的泛洪消息由可变数量的八位字节组成，如下所示：

contents.text: n = 41 + length of VLAN list
contents.zh-CHS: n=41+VLAN列表的长度

contents.text: Frame header/ISMP packet header
contents.zh-CHS: 帧报头/ISMP数据包报头

contents.text: This 20-octet field contains the frame header and the ISMP packet header.
contents.zh-CHS: 此20个八位字节字段包含帧头和ISMP数据包头。

contents.text: Version
contents.zh-CHS: 版本

contents.text: This 2-octet field contains the version number of the message type. This document describes ISMP message type 7, version 1.
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段包含消息类型的版本号。本文档介绍ISMP消息类型7，版本1。

contents.text: Opcode
contents.zh-CHS: 操作码

contents.text: This 2-octet field contains the operation code of the message. The value here should be 1, indicating the message is a flood request.
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段包含消息的操作代码。此处的值应为1，表示消息是洪水请求。

contents.text: Status
contents.zh-CHS: 地位

contents.text: This 2-octet field is currently unused. It is reserved for future use.
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段当前未使用。这是留作将来使用的。

contents.text: Call tag
contents.zh-CHS: 呼叫标签

contents.text: This 2-octet field contains the call tag of the endstation packet encapsulated within this tag-based flood message. The call tag is a 16-bit value (generated by the originating switch) that uniquely identifies the packet.
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段包含封装在此基于标记的泛洪消息中的终端站数据包的呼叫标记。呼叫标签是一个16位值（由发起交换机生成），它唯一地标识数据包。

contents.text: Source MAC of packet
contents.zh-CHS: 包的源MAC

contents.text: This 6-octet field contains the physical (MAC) address of the endstation that originated the packet identified by the call tag.
contents.zh-CHS: 此6位字节字段包含发起由呼叫标签标识的数据包的终端站的物理（MAC）地址。

contents.text: Originating switch MAC
contents.zh-CHS: 始发交换机MAC

contents.text: This 6-octet field contains the physical (MAC) address of the switch that issued the original tag-based flooded message.
contents.zh-CHS: 此6-octet字段包含发出原始基于标记的消息的交换机的物理（MAC）地址。

contents.text: Count
contents.zh-CHS: 计数

contents.text: This 1-octet field contains the number of VLAN identifiers included in the VLAN list.
contents.zh-CHS: 此1-octet字段包含VLAN列表中包含的VLAN标识符的数量。

contents.text: VLAN list
contents.zh-CHS: VLAN列表

contents.text: This variable-length field contains a list of the VLAN identifiers of all VLANs to which the source endstation belongs. Each entry in this list has the following format:
contents.zh-CHS: 此可变长度字段包含源端站所属的所有VLAN的VLAN标识符列表。此列表中的每个条目的格式如下：

contents.text: The 1-octet value length field contains the length of the VLAN identifier. VLAN identifiers can be from 1 to 16 characters long.
contents.zh-CHS: 1-octet值长度字段包含VLAN标识符的长度。VLAN标识符的长度可以是1到16个字符。

contents.text: Original packet
contents.zh-CHS: 原始数据包

contents.text: This variable-length field contains the original packet as sent by the source endstation.
contents.zh-CHS: 此可变长度字段包含源端站发送的原始数据包。

contents.text: 6.6.2 Version 1.8
The Interswitch Tag-Based Flood message used by SFVLAN version 1.8 consists of a variable number of octets, as shown below:
contents.zh-CHS: SFVLAN版本1.8使用的基于交换机间标签的泛洪消息由可变数量的八位字节组成，如下所示：

contents.text: Note:
contents.zh-CHS: 注:

contents.text: SFVLAN version 1.8 also recognizes the Interswitch Tag-Based Flood message as described in Section 6.6.1.
contents.zh-CHS: SFVLAN版本1.8还可识别第6.6.1节所述的基于交换机间标签的泛洪消息。

contents.text: n = 41 + length of VLAN list
contents.zh-CHS: n=41+VLAN列表的长度

contents.text: Frame header/ISMP packet header
contents.zh-CHS: 帧报头/ISMP数据包报头

contents.text: This 20-octet field contains the frame header and the ISMP packet header.
contents.zh-CHS: 此20个八位字节字段包含帧头和ISMP数据包头。

contents.text: - The frame header source address contains a value of 02-00-1D-00-xx-yy, where xx-yy is a value set by the VLAN Manager application to tag the frame header with the VLAN identifier. This value ranges from 2 to 4095. For example, a value of 100 would be set as 00-64.
contents.zh-CHS: - 帧头源地址包含值02-00-1D-00-xx-yy，其中xx yy是VLAN管理器应用程序设置的值，用于用VLAN标识符标记帧头。该值的范围为2到4095。例如，值100将设置为00-64。

contents.text: - The frame header type field contains a value of 0x81FF. Note that this differs from all other ISMP messages.
contents.zh-CHS: - 帧头类型字段包含值0x81FF。请注意，这与所有其他ISMP消息不同。

contents.text: VLAN identifier
contents.zh-CHS: VLAN标识符

contents.text: This 2-octet field contains the VLAN identifier of the packet source.
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段包含数据包源的VLAN标识符。

contents.text: Version
contents.zh-CHS: 版本

contents.text: This 2-octet field contains the version number of the message type. This section describes version 2 of the Interswitch Tag-Based Flood message.
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段包含消息类型的版本号。本节介绍基于交换机间标签的泛洪消息的版本2。

contents.text: Opcode
contents.zh-CHS: 操作码

contents.text: This 2-octet field contains the operation code of the message. Valid values here are as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段包含消息的操作代码。此处的有效值如下所示：

contents.text: 1 The message is a flood request. The original packet is complete within this message.
contents.zh-CHS: 1该消息是一个泛洪请求。原始数据包在此消息中已完成。

contents.text: 2 The message is a fragmented flood request. The first portion of the original packet is contained in this message.
contents.zh-CHS: 2该消息是一个分段的泛洪请求。原始数据包的第一部分包含在此消息中。

contents.text: 3 The message is a fragmented flood request. The second portion of the original packet is contained in this message.
contents.zh-CHS: 3该消息是一个分段洪水请求。原始数据包的第二部分包含在此消息中。

contents.text: Status
contents.zh-CHS: 地位

contents.text: This 2-octet field is currently unused. It is reserved for future use.
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段当前未使用。这是留作将来使用的。

contents.text: Call tag
contents.zh-CHS: 呼叫标签

contents.text: This 2-octet field contains the call tag of the endstation packet encapsulated within this tag-based flood message. The call tag is a 16-bit value (generated by the originating switch) that uniquely identifies the packet.
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段包含封装在此基于标记的泛洪消息中的终端站数据包的呼叫标记。呼叫标签是一个16位值（由发起交换机生成），它唯一地标识数据包。

contents.text: Source MAC of packet
contents.zh-CHS: 包的源MAC

contents.text: This 6-octet field contains the physical (MAC) address of the endstation that originated the packet identified by the call tag.
contents.zh-CHS: 此6位字节字段包含发起由呼叫标签标识的数据包的终端站的物理（MAC）地址。

contents.text: Originating switch MAC
contents.zh-CHS: 始发交换机MAC

contents.text: This 6-octet field contains the physical (MAC) address of the switch that issued the original tag-based flooded message.
contents.zh-CHS: 此6-octet字段包含发出原始基于标记的消息的交换机的物理（MAC）地址。

contents.text: Count
contents.zh-CHS: 计数

contents.text: This 1-octet field contains the number of VLAN identifiers included in the VLAN list.
contents.zh-CHS: 此1-octet字段包含VLAN列表中包含的VLAN标识符的数量。

contents.text: VLAN list
contents.zh-CHS: VLAN列表

contents.text: This variable-length field contains a list of the VLAN identifiers of all VLANs to which the source endstation belongs. Each entry in this list has the following format:
contents.zh-CHS: 此可变长度字段包含源端站所属的所有VLAN的VLAN标识符列表。此列表中的每个条目的格式如下：

contents.text: The 1-octet value length field contains the length of the VLAN identifier. VLAN identifiers can be from 1 to 16 characters long.
contents.zh-CHS: 1-octet值长度字段包含VLAN标识符的长度。VLAN标识符的长度可以是1到16个字符。

contents.text: Original packet
contents.zh-CHS: 原始数据包

contents.text: This variable-length field contains the original packet as sent by the source endstation.
contents.zh-CHS: 此可变长度字段包含源端站发送的原始数据包。

contents.text: 6.7 Interswitch Tap/Untap Message
contents.zh-CHS: 6.7 开关间Tap/Untap信息

contents.text: The Interswitch Tap/Untap message consists of a variable number of octets, as shown below:
contents.zh-CHS: 开关间Tap/Untap消息由可变数量的八位字节组成，如下所示：

contents.text: Frame header/ISMP packet header
contents.zh-CHS: 帧报头/ISMP数据包报头

contents.text: This 20-octet field contains the frame header and the ISMP packet header.
contents.zh-CHS: 此20个八位字节字段包含帧头和ISMP数据包头。

contents.text: Version
contents.zh-CHS: 版本

contents.text: This 2-octet field contains the version number of the message type. This document describes ISMP message type 8, version 1.
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段包含消息类型的版本号。本文档介绍ISMP消息类型8，版本1。

contents.text: Opcode
contents.zh-CHS: 操作码

contents.text: tet field contains the operation type of the message. ues are as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: tet字段包含消息的操作类型。用途如下:

contents.text: 1 The message is a Tap request. 2 The message is a Tap response. 3 The message is an Untap request. 4 The message is an Untap response.
contents.zh-CHS: 1该消息是一个点击请求。2该消息为点击响应。3该消息是Untap请求。4该消息是Untap响应。

contents.text: Status
contents.zh-CHS: 地位

contents.text: This 2-octet field contains the current status of the tap request. Valid values are as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段包含tap请求的当前状态。有效值如下所示：

contents.text: 1 Switch must disable outport on untap. (DisableOutport) 2 Switch must keep outports on untap. (KeepOutport) 3 Probe not found this leg of spanning tree. (ProbeNotFound) 4 Still searching for probe switch. (OutportDecisionUnknown) 5 Unassigned. (StatusUnassigned) 6 (reserved) 7 (reserved) 8 (reserved) 9 (reserved)
contents.zh-CHS: 1开关必须禁用untap上的输出端口。（禁用输出端口）2开关必须将输出端口保持在untap上。（KeepOutport）3探测器未找到生成树的此分支。（ProbeNotFound）4仍在搜索探针开关。（OutportDecisionUnknown）5未分配。（未分配状态）6（保留）7（保留）8（保留）9（保留）

contents.text: See Section 5.2.3 for details on the use of this field.
contents.zh-CHS: 有关该字段使用的详细信息，请参见第5.2.3节。

contents.text: Error code
contents.zh-CHS: 错误代码

contents.text: This 2-octet field contains the response message error code of the requested operation. Valid values are as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段包含请求操作的响应消息错误代码。有效值如下所示：

contents.text: 1 Operation successful. (NoError) 2 No response heard from downstream neighbor. (Timeout) 3 Port does not exist on probe switch. (BadPort) 4 Message invalid. (InvalidMessage) 5 Version number invalid. (IncompatibleVersions)
contents.zh-CHS: 1手术成功。（无错误）2未听到下游邻居的响应。（超时）探测器交换机上不存在3端口。（BadPort）4消息无效。（InvalidMessage）5版本号无效。（不兼容）

contents.text: Header type
contents.zh-CHS: 标题类型

contents.text: This 2-octet field contains the type of information contained in the header field. Currently, valid values are as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段包含标头字段中包含的信息类型。目前，有效值如下所示：

contents.text: 1 (reserved) 2 Header contains destination and source endstation MAC addresses.
contents.zh-CHS: 1（保留）2报头包含目标和源端站MAC地址。

contents.text: Header length
contents.zh-CHS: 首部长度

contents.text: This 2-octet field contains the length of the header field. Currently, this field always contains a value of 12.
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段包含标题字段的长度。当前，此字段始终包含值12。

contents.text: Direction
contents.zh-CHS: 方向

contents.text: This 2-octet field contains a value indicating the type of tap. Valid values are as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 此2-octet字段包含一个指示抽头类型的值。有效值如下所示：

contents.text: 1 (reserved) 2 Tap is bi-directional and data should be captured flowing in either direction over the connection. 3 Tap is uni-directional and data should be captured only when it flows from the source to the destination.
contents.zh-CHS: 1（保留）2抽头是双向的，应在连接的任意方向捕获数据流。3 Tap是单向的，仅当数据从源流向目标时才应捕获数据。

contents.text: Probe switch MAC
contents.zh-CHS: 探测开关MAC

contents.text: This 6-octet field contains the physical (MAC) address of the switch to which the probe is attached.
contents.zh-CHS: 此6-octet字段包含探测器连接到的交换机的物理（MAC）地址。

contents.text: Probe port
contents.zh-CHS: 探测端口

contents.text: This 4-octet field contains the logical port number (on the probe switch) to which the probe is attached.
contents.zh-CHS: 此4-octet字段包含探测器连接到的逻辑端口号（位于探测器交换机上）。

contents.text: Reserved
contents.zh-CHS: 含蓄的

contents.text: These 12 octets are reserved.
contents.zh-CHS: 这12个八位组是保留的。

contents.text: Header
contents.zh-CHS: 标题

contents.text: This variable-length field contains the header that identifies the connection being tapped. The length of the header is stored in the length field.
contents.zh-CHS: 此可变长度字段包含标识正在分接的连接的标头。标题的长度存储在长度字段中。

contents.text: Currently, this field is 12 octets long and contains the 6-octet physical address of the connection's destination endstation, followed by the 6-octet physical address of the connection's source endstation, as shown below:
contents.zh-CHS: 当前，此字段的长度为12个八位字节，包含连接的目标端站的6个八位字节的物理地址，后跟连接的源端站的6个八位字节的物理地址，如下所示：

contents.text: 7. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 安全考虑

contents.text: Requested call connections are established or denied based on the VLAN policy of the source and destination addresses specified within the packet. Section 4.4.1 discusses this process in detail.
contents.zh-CHS: 根据数据包中指定的源地址和目标地址的VLAN策略建立或拒绝请求的呼叫连接。第4.4.1节详细讨论了该过程。
